Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 41st overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1963...
Injured on 4/19/1967 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 6/20/1967 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1968, off Clint Dunklin (SYR)...
Earned first career win on 4/8/1968...
Hit first career homerun on 7/21/1968, off Dave Gould (WT)...
Injured on 7/14/1970 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/1/1974 to a 5-year deal worth $5,100,000 per year...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Boston (UBA) on 2/11/1974 (Going to PIL: P B. Clark. Going to SHP: P W. Cerda, P G. Sibley)...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Coney Island on 1/31/1975 (Going to PIL: P R. Emert, P O. Reaves, P A. Lent, P R. Poli. Going to CI: P B. Clark)...
Injured on 8/21/1981 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 3/1/1984 to a minor league contract.
Released by Bay City on 4/7/1984...
